**Teeth Brushing and Flossing Guide**: Create an interactive app or online platform that provides detailed instructions on proper brushing techniques and flossing methods. The platform can include videos, quizzes, and personalized feedback based on user input. This would educate people on maintaining oral health without professional dental care. Confidence Score: 0.9

**DIY Dental Kits**: Develop a line of at-home dental kits that include items like toothpaste, mouthwash, dental floss, and possibly DIY whitening strips. These kits could come with instructions on how to use each item effectively for basic oral hygiene. Confidence Score: 0.8

**Virtual Dental Consultations**: Offer telehealth services where users can consult with dentists remotely via video calls. The dentist can provide advice, diagnose issues, and recommend treatment plans. Confidence Score: 0.9

**Oral Health Workshops**: Organize community workshops led by dental hygienists who can teach participants about oral health maintenance, demonstrate proper brushing and flossing techniques, and answer any questions they might have. Confidence Score: 0.8

**Nutritional Guide for Oral Health**: Create a comprehensive guide or series of articles explaining how diet affects oral health. Include tips on foods that promote oral health and those that should be avoided. Partner with local grocery stores or online retailers to offer special discounts on recommended products. Confidence Score: 0.7
